text: Elizabeth Winifred Boger (known as Betsy Blair; December 11, 1923 â€“ March 13, 2009) was an American movie and stage actress. Her movies include A Double Life and Marty. Blair was born in Cliffside Park, New Jersey. She died in London from cancer of unknown primary origin at 85.
